alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kent; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washington and south central Kent Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 208 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Exeter, or 7 miles south of Coventry, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Warwick, Coventry, West Warwick, North Kingstown, East Greenwich, Richmond, Exeter and West Greenwich. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
